title: Copperfield 1 Month Free | Dog Park | Premium Amenities | FREE Move!
posting_body: ['Houston, TX, 77095', '1 bedroom     $1,200-1,455 /mo', '  697-830 sf', '2 bedroom     $1,660-2,125 /mo', '  1,056-1,364 sf', '3 bedroom     $2,325 /mo', '  1,652 sf', 'Special:', '4wks free upfront w/15mo', 'Deposit: 200-500  Pet Policy: Cats:Yes    Dogs:Yes', 'Built: 2022  Location: Bear Creek/ Copperfield/ Fairfield', 'Prices & Specials change daily, contact me for availability', 'Features: New Luxury Community now leasing in Copperfield, Spacious One and Two bedrooms, Stainless Steel Appliances and Island Kitchens, Shaker Style Cabinetry with Granite Countertops, Subway Style Backsplashes, Garden Tubs and Walk in Closets, Club House and Business Center, Game, Sports Room, and Fitness Center, Dog Park, 24/7/365 Package Locker Access, Electric Car Charger and Detached Garages, Sparkling Pool with Outdoor Grilling Space & Hammock Courtyard', 'Community Amenities: School bus stop, Pool, Dog Park, Gated entrance, Carports, Club house, Fitness center, Play ground, Picnic area, Free WiFi Areas, Perimeter fence, Outdoor Grills, Door to door trash pickup, Game/Sport room, Business center', 'Unit Amenities: Frost free refrigerators, Dishwashers, W/D machines, Microwaves, Non-carpeted flooring, Garbage disposals, Self cleaning ovens, Walk-in closets, Custom carpet, Garden/large tubs, Premium Countertops, Attached garages, Miniblinds, High ceilings, Premium Appliances, Ice makers, Ceiling fans', 'Our service is completely free to you - apartment locating - we specialize in luxury apartment leasing.', 'Must make 2.5-3 times the rent in income', 'Not what you are looking for?', "We have 100's of communities to choose from.", 'We can send a listing based on your certain criteria.', '2nd Chance options available - felony - misdemeanor - eviction - bad credit - broken lease - closed bankruptcy', 'call or text', 'Ask me about my free move or rebate!', 'Refer to Apt#2772C']
